turns.text: "The mill grinds the grain, but the grain is not destroyed.  <u>Although</u> it is altered..."

turns.speaker: DOUG
turns.text: Well, I <u>know</u>, because they <u>told</u> me you were with that writer from the, you see, this is what I mean, the whole <u>town</u> has been warped by the, by, by the presence of the movie company, they holler, and we jump, you have a <u>date</u>, they call, you're doing business nine o'clock at night.  It isn't...
